languages.text: Опираясь на более детальные описания корабля от разведотряда, Хейнрикс безошибочно определяет природу богопротивного судна — без сомнения, это творение ксенорасы друкари.

traits.locale_text: Опираясь на более детальные описания корабля от разведотряда, Хейнрикс безошибочно определяет природу богопротивного судна — без сомнения, это творение ксенорасы друкари.

languages.text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.
languages.original_text: Опираясь на более детальные описания корабля от разведотряда, Хейнрикс безошибочно определяет природу богопротивного судна — без сомнения, это творение ксенорасы друкари.

traits.locale_text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari.
Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.
Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.
Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.

languages.text: 根据侦察队的详细描述，海因里希准确识别出了这艘邪恶舰船的本质。毫无疑问，它属于某个被称为“黑暗灵族”的异形。
languages.original_text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: 根据侦察队的详细描述，海因里希准确识别出了这艘邪恶舰船的本质。毫无疑问，它属于某个被称为“黑暗灵族”的异形。

languages.text: 偵察隊からの詳細な説明をもとに、ハインリックスは穢れた船の性質を正確に特定する。デュカーリと呼ばれる異種族のものであることは間違いない。
languages.original_text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: 偵察隊からの詳細な説明をもとに、ハインリックスは穢れた船の性質を正確に特定する。デュカーリと呼ばれる異種族のものであることは間違いない。

languages.text: Basándose en las descripciones más detalladas del grupo de exploración, Heinrix identifica con precisión la naturaleza de la nave impía. No hay duda de que pertenece a la raza xenos llamada Drukhari.
languages.original_text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: Basándose en las descripciones más detalladas del grupo de exploración, Heinrix identifica con precisión la naturaleza de la nave impía. No hay duda de que pertenece a la raza xenos llamada Drukhari.

languages.text: Basierend auf den detaillierteren Beschreibungen des Spähtrupps konnte Heinrix den Zweck des unheiligen Schiffs präzise identifizieren. Es besteht kein Zweifel, dass es der Xenos-Spezies gehört, die man Drukhari nennt.
languages.original_text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: Basierend auf den detaillierteren Beschreibungen des Spähtrupps konnte Heinrix den Zweck des unheiligen Schiffs präzise identifizieren. Es besteht kein Zweifel, dass es der Xenos-Spezies gehöt, die man Drukhari nennt.

languages.text: D'après la description plus détaillée du groupe d'éclaireurs, Heinrix parvient à identifier la nature du vaisseau impie. Il appartient sans aucun doute possible à la race de xénos appelés Drukharis.
languages.original_text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: D'après la description plus détaillée du groupe d'éclaireurs, Heinrix parvient à identifier la nature du vaisseau impie. Il appartient sans aucun doute possible à la race de xénos appelés Drukhari.

languages.text: Keşif ekibinin yaptığı ayrıntılı açıklamalar sonrası Heinrix, uğursuz geminin doğasının başarıyla tanımlıyor. Geminin Drukhari denen zeno ırkına ait olduğuna şüphe yok.
languages.original_text: Based on the more detailed descriptions from the scouting party, Heinrix accurately identifies the nature of the unholy vessel. There's no doubt that it belongs to the xenos race called the Drukhari.
